3.1.hd_quote: If you have the 3.1 and you are really introspective, the first thing that you know is that you are confused.
3.1.behavioral_axis: Trusts that order will emerge over time; allows confusion without forcing.
3.1.shadow_axis: Panics and tries to force clarity too early, then everything breaks down.

3.2.hd_quote: Everybody looks at the 3.2 and they say, "Aren't they confused? They do not know where they are going."
3.2.behavioral_axis: Projects "I don't know" and pulls in fixers, teachers, rescuers.
3.2.shadow_axis: Lets others steer their mutation, creating dependence and instability.

3.3.hd_quote: An innate knowing of what is sterile and fertile, where the mutation is specifically biological and dependant on collaboration with others.
3.3.behavioral_axis: Mutates through messy experimentation, choosing what’s actually fertile and viable.
3.3.shadow_axis: Chaotic trial-and-error in sex/resources that leaves wreckage behind.

3.4.hd_quote: Innate quality which attracts valued guidance.
3.4.behavioral_axis: Draws in allies and advisors just by broadcasting "I’m confused."
3.4.shadow_axis: Ignores guidance out of ego; externalizes confusion to manipulate attention.

3.5.hd_quote: When actions designed to overcome confusion alienate others.
3.5.behavioral_axis: Holds convictions under projection: "I'm not confused, let me show you."
3.5.shadow_axis: Becomes the scapegoat, appeasing others and suffering to keep the peace.

3.6.hd_quote: It is not up to us to dictate the nature of the solution. Ordering comes of itself.
3.6.behavioral_axis: Embodies "it’ll sort itself" patience; recognizes when struggle is futile.
3.6.shadow_axis: Detached fatalism that drifts into depression and gives up on life.
